edu.ucla.sspace.evaluation
Interface MultipleChoiceQuestion

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleMultipleChoiceQuestion
public interface MultipleChoiceQuestion

A question that provides a prompt and one or more options to choose from as the answer.

See Also:
WordChoiceEvaluation

Method Summary
 int getCorrectAnswer()
          Returns the index of the correct answer in the list of options.
 List<String> getOptions()
          Returns a list of options to the prompt question.
 String getPrompt()
          Returns the question prompt.
 

Method Detail

getPrompt

String getPrompt()
Returns the question prompt. This may be a short as a single word.

getOptions

List<String> getOptions()
Returns a list of options to the prompt question.

getCorrectAnswer

int getCorrectAnswer()
Returns the index of the correct answer in the list of options.
